decision_conditions: The replacement tree must be planted on or near the existing tree by April 2025; the tree should be of a native species of Sorbus, Prunus or Birch species that is more suited to the site and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted.

Reason: To ensure the continued amenity provided by the tree(s) and the planting of an appropriate species and in order to preserve the character and appearance of this part of the Montpelier Park conservation area.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: TPO No 328 Robinia Pseudoacacia (not the hornbeam listed on the TPO map) is causing damage to surrounding walls  removal of the tree and replace with a smaller British specimen more in keeping with the space.
